content: from website > cozy and soft this beginner friendly crochet blanket pattern includes a teddy bear and pocket for extra fun **skill level ** easy **supplies ** - 1 ball yellow - 1 ball light blue - 2 balls white - polyester fiberfill - brown embroidery floss - stitch marker blanket measures approximately 31 5 x 36 bear stands about 8 5 tall * this pattern is for a pocketed blanket and a bear * this pattern is also available on the joann com website as crochet pocket blankie 1 1 http //www joann com/crochet-pocket-blankie/p258126 html
